directions.step:
Place banana in tortilla shell. Sprinkle chunks of chocolate on banana. Roll banana & chocolate in the flour tortillas. Seal edges with water like when frying a wonton and deep fry until tortilla is crispy and blistered. Drain; then roll in a cinnamon and sugar mix. Can be served with or without ice cream and you decide on the size. This recipe is from Stu Pickell's Kitchen.
